title: lolclient.exe error everytime i login

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: (lolclient.exe has stopped working) constantly pops up whenever I attempt to login. I recall there was a message pinned near the top of the client about a potential fix; however, after un-pinning LoL from my taskbar and using the repair tool, I still recieve these errors and am unable to play.

replies.body:
Client crashes before reaching being able to log in are generally caused by the client disconnecting from the game platform entirely, which crashes the client. There are a number of factors that could cause this to happen, but our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will take you through the most common fixes. 

If you still have issues after working through those steps, please let me know.
Today I did a fresh install of Win10 and league ontop of it, still got the same problems.. I don't know what to do now to fix it.

Since you're still having issues after taking those steps, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Should you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), you'll be expediting your ticket and providing our techs with the context necessary to properly address your issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I followed those steps a few days ago, still no change.

The crash bug related to having League pinned to your taskbar has been resolved.  

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.
